name: T - Nicole
_source: if;v('carson')
multi_add_portrait;Nicole;Left;Emma;Right
bop_portrait;Nicole
speak;Nicole; Emm! I saw you comin' this time! Can't sneak up on lil' old me now!
speak;Emma; Oh, I wasn't trying to sneak up on you, but{tgm}...
speak;Nicole; Hm? Whatcha wanna ask me then?
speak;Emma; I talked with Carson earlier about how you two met,{w} and I wanted to hear the story from your point of view.

speak;Nicole; How we met{tgm}...{tgm} Oh dearie, that's quite a story.{w} We met when he was robbin' my house for food.{w} I recognized his face from a wanted poster around town,{w} and I was scared out of my skin to confront him!
speak;Emma; He told me about that.{w} You ended up chasing after him, right?

speak;Nicole; Yep, I sure did.{w} Even though he was tryin' to rob me, I helped him.{w} Carson and I would meet up whenever I could get away from my mama,{w} and whenever he wasn't in the middle of evadin' the law.{w} Then, one day, my thievin' little prince stole me away from home,{w} and we ran away together.{w} Haven't looked back since.
speak;Emma; That's just about what he told me.
speak;Nicole; I bet he didn't tell ya we were a duo act for a while.
speak;Emma; Huh? What do you mean?

speak;Nicole; Oh honey, you shoulda seen the two of us.{w} I ain't proud of it all, but when the two of us were lookin' for a place to call home,{w} we'd have to do a bitta schemin' to eat.{w} Why, I'd throw the biggest scene as a distraction,{w} and we'd be runnin' out of town with an armful of apples,{w} hound dogs and the like on our tails!
speak;Emma; Oh wow, I never would've guessed you were a trained thief too.
speak;Nicole; I never did any of the thievin' myself.{w} Carson's the one who can really use his fingers.{w} I just made a ruckus to draw attention.

speak;Emma; It's not the most conventional love story, but{tgm}...{tgm}it's still sweet in its own way.{w} Aren't you a little afraid of heading to Rosefall, though?{w} Carson told me your mother's there.
bop_portrait;Nicole

speak;Nicole; Oh no{tgm}...{tgm} Oh no{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Calm down, Nicole, calm down.{w} You have your friends now{tgm}...{tgm}{w} You ahve Carson{tgm}...{tgm}{w} She can't hurt you{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I-I will be alright E-Emma, trust me.{w} I just need some time to myself and to talk to Carson about this.{w} I-I'll talk to you later, alright?
speak;Emma; Alright, Nicole, make sure to take care.
speak;Emma; I think it would've been better if I had said nothing...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
multi_remove_portrait;Nicole;Emma
if;v('nicole')
remove_talk;Emma;Nicole
end
else
multi_add_portrait;Nicole;Left;Emma;Right
speak;Emma; Nicole, are you well?
bop_portrait;Nicole
speak;Nicole; Eeek!
speak;Nicole;E-Emma, you scared me!
speak;Emma; Nicole{tgm}...{tgm}still shy as ever.{w} What's that about, anyway? You're a bundle of nerves.
speak;Nicole; Well{tgm}...{tgm}it's just some stuff from back when I was knee high to a hay bale.{w} I wouldn't be anythin' interestin' to you.
speak;Emma;Try me.
speak;Nicole;Well{tgm}...

speak;Nicole; Back home, my family was real poor,{w} and I didn't have the best upbringin' when I was little.{w} My papa hightailed it when the money dried up,{w} and Mama was too busy lookin' for happiness at the bottom of bottles.
speak;Emma; Oh{tgm}...{tgm} Oh my{tgm}...
speak;Nicole; There was one person who looked after me though: my brother.{w} But he was taken away from me before long in a bandit raid{tgm}...{tgm}{w} and Mama took it out on me.
speak;Emma;But{tgm}...
bop_portrait;Emma
speak;Emma;But that's not your fault!
bop_portrait;Emma
speak;Emma; You were just a little girl!

speak;Nicole; When it rains, it pours, honey.{w} The years of screamin' and beatin's took a lot out of me, and I don't miss them, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} It's the trials and tribulations that make us grow.{w} I got the strength to leave with my man and never look back.
speak;Emma; That's just horrible{tgm}...{tgm}{w} No wonder you're so jumpy.
bop_portrait;Nicole
speak;Nicole; W-Wait, am I too jumpy?!
speak;Emma; Oh, um, never mind, Nicole. You're just perfect how you are.
speak;Emma; But this definitely explains a lot...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
multi_remove_portrait;Emma;Nicole
remove_talk;Emma;Nicole
level_var;nicole;True
end
